text: Jón Margeir Sverrisson (born 22 November 1992) is a Paralympic swimmer from Iceland, competing in the S14 disability category in freestyle and breaststroke. He represented Iceland at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London, winning the gold medal in the Men's 200m freestyle (S14). ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Jon Margeir Sverrisson Jon Margeir Sverrisson Jon Margeir Sverrisson Category:Swimmers at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Jon Margeir Sverrisson Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Male breaststroke swimmers Category:Male freestyle swimmers Category:S14-classified Paralympic swimmers Category:Paralympic medalists in swimming
title: Jón Margeir Sverrisson
